pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calibration of P-Values for Point Null Hypothesis Testing // Calibrate p-values under a robust perspective using the methods developed by Sellke, Bayarri, and Berger (2001) doi:10.1198/000313001300339950 and obtain measures of the evidence provided by the data in favor of point null hypotheses which are safer and more straightforward to interpret.
